title: Conference Championship preview
itunes:title: Conference Championship preview
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling & Gregg Rosenthal – discuss all the latest news from around the NFL including the Raiders filing to move their franchise to Las Vegas, and Colts quarterback Andrew Luck undergoing shoulder surgery. Then, the heroes look ahead to Championship Sunday and preview the final two games before Super Bowl LI.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
